name: The Celtos
description:
The Celtos is the post apocalyptic moment where heaven and hell opened up, releasing angels and demons, who are in constant war on earth / heaven and hell.
At the time of the event, humans received an energy released from the two kingdoms, acquiring supernatural, physical and nature powers.
Your objective is to survive in this war, always seeking wisdom, to face the two kingdoms and restore the peace that existed until the war started.

The Celtos brings you the nostalgia of being able to venture into a world with your friends, where there are mythological beings and systems of infinite hunts.
You can choose between magic classes, body-to-body and distance.
Our focus is to do something fair, without pay to win, which today is widely used in multiplayer games.
We are influenced by Ragnarok, Tibia, Mu Online and Zelda games.
Frequent updates will come bringing more and more news and gameplay.
In it you will find:
System of Quests / Diaries;
Class System;
PvP and Groups System;
Friendship System;
Night / Day System;
Boss system;
Item Rarity System;
All basic system of an MMORPG.


So, will you come with us for this great adventure and be part of our history?
